        function  PopulateContextMenuItems<span class="line"><!---->function  PopulateContextMenuItems<!----></span><br>```c++ <span class="line"><!---->```c++ <!----></span><br>static bool PopulateContextMenuItems(v8::Isolate* isolate,<span class="line"><!---->static bool PopulateContextMenuItems(v8::Isolate* isolate,<!----></span><br>                                     const v8::Local<v8::Array>& item_array,<span class="line"><!---->                                     const v8::Local&lt;v8::Array&gt;&amp; item_array,<!----></span><br>                                     std::vector<MenuItemInfo>& items) {<span class="line"><!---->                                     std::vector&lt;MenuItemInfo&gt;&amp; items) {<!----></span><br>  v8::Local<v8::Context> context = isolate->GetCurrentContext();<span class="line"><!---->  v8::Local&lt;v8::Context&gt; context = isolate-&gt;GetCurrentContext();<!----></span><br>  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < item_array->Length(); ++i) {<span class="line"><!---->  for (uint32_t i = 0; i &lt; item_array-&gt;Length(); ++i) {<!----></span><br>    v8::Local<v8::Object> item =<span class="line"><!---->    v8::Local&lt;v8::Object&gt; item =<!----></span><br>        item_array->Get(context, i).ToLocalChecked().As<v8::Object>();  //here just cast v8::object without any check<span class="line"><!---->        item_array-&gt;Get(context, i).ToLocalChecked().As&lt;v8::Object&gt;();  //here just cast v8::object without any check<!----></span><br>    v8::Local<v8::Value> type;<span class="line"><!---->    v8::Local&lt;v8::Value&gt; type;<!----></span><br>    v8::Local<v8::Value> id;<span class="line"><!---->    v8::Local&lt;v8::Value&gt; id;<!----></span><br>    v8::Local<v8::Value> label;<span class="line"><!---->    v8::Local&lt;v8::Value&gt; label;<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br><br>how to trigger?<span class="line"><!---->how to trigger?<!----></span><br>1) Visit chrome://inspect<span class="line"><!---->1) Visit chrome://inspect<!----></span><br>2) Open devtools (F12/Ctrl-Shift-i/etc.)<span class="line"><!---->2) Open devtools (F12/Ctrl-Shift-i/etc.)<!----></span><br>3) Click on 'other' in the left hand pane.<span class="line"><!---->3) Click on 'other' in the left hand pane.<!----></span><br>4) Click 'inspect' on one of the 'devtools://' targets - this opens a devtools window<span class="line"><!---->4) Click 'inspect' on one of the 'devtools://' targets - this opens a devtools window<!----></span><br>5) In the devtools window console, run `DevToolsHost.showContextMenuAtPoint(1.1, 2.2, [0x41414141]);`<span class="line"><!---->5) In the devtools window console, run `DevToolsHost.showContextMenuAtPoint(1.1, 2.2, [0x41414141]);`<!----></span><br><br>it will crash in debug version or TOT.<span class="line"><!---->it will crash in debug version or TOT.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        I think the severity is fairly low since this cannot be programatically exploited. User interaction is necessary in order to execute arbitrary JS code in the DevTools' context.<span class="line"><!---->I think the severity is fairly low since this cannot be programatically exploited. User interaction is necessary in order to execute arbitrary JS code in the DevTools' context.<!----></span><br><br>However, I agree that we should get this fixed.<span class="line"><!---->However, I agree that we should get this fixed.<!----></span><br><br>The fix is to perform an object check here: <span class="line"><!---->The fix is to perform an object check here: <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/renderer/bindings/core/v8/custom/v8_dev_tools_host_custom.cc;l=69;drc=c60368c4e84069693180aedbe1ece21d25837501<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/renderer/bindings/core/v8/custom/v8_dev_tools_host_custom.cc;l=69;drc=c60368c4e84069693180aedbe1ece21d25837501"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/renderer/bindings/core/v8/custom/v8_dev_tools_host_custom.cc;l=69;drc=c60368c4e84069693180aedbe1ece21d25837501<!----></a><br><br>And it would be nice to add a test similar to this <span class="line"><!---->And it would be nice to add a test similar to this <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/web_tests/http/tests/devtools/elements/copy-styles.js;l=25;drc=047c7dc4ee1ce908d7fea38ca063fa2f80f92c77<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/web_tests/http/tests/devtools/elements/copy-styles.js;l=25;drc=047c7dc4ee1ce908d7fea38ca063fa2f80f92c77"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/web_tests/http/tests/devtools/elements/copy-styles.js;l=25;drc=047c7dc4ee1ce908d7fea38ca063fa2f80f92c77<!----></a><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      </div><br>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        This issue requires additional review before it can be merged to the LTS channel. Please answer the following questions to help us evaluate this merge:<span class="line"><!---->This issue requires additional review before it can be merged to the LTS channel. Please answer the following questions to help us evaluate this merge:<!----></span><br><br>1. Number of CLs needed for this fix and links to them.<span class="line"><!---->1. Number of CLs needed for this fix and links to them.<!----></span><br>2. Level of complexity (High, Medium, Low - Explain)<span class="line"><!---->2. Level of complexity (High, Medium, Low - Explain)<!----></span><br>3. Has this been merged to a stable release? beta release?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has this been merged to a stable release? beta release?<!----></span><br>4. Overall Recommendation (Yes, No)<span class="line"><!---->4.         function  PopulateContextMenuItems<span class="line"><!---->function  PopulateContextMenuItems<!----></span><br>```c++ <span class="line"><!---->```c++ <!----></span><br>static bool PopulateContextMenuItems(v8::Isolate* isolate,<span class="line"><!---->static bool PopulateContextMenuItems(v8::Isolate* isolate,<!----></span><br>                                     const v8::Local<v8::Array>& item_array,<span class="line"><!---->                                     const v8::Local&lt;v8::Array&gt;&amp; items) {<!----></span><br>  v8::Local<v8::Context> context = isolate->GetCurrentContext();<span class="line"><!---->  v8::Local&lt;v8::Context&gt; context = isolate-&gt;GetCurrentContext();<!----></span><br>  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < item_array->Length(); ++i) {<span class="line"><!---->  for (uint32_t i = 0; i &lt; item_array-&gt;Length(); ++i) {<!----></span><br>    v8::Local<v8::Object> item =<span class="line"><!---->    v8::Local&lt;v8::Object&gt; id;<!----></span><br>    v8::Local<v8::Value> label;<span class="line"><!---->    v8::Local&lt;v8::Value&gt; label;<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br><br>how to trigger?<span class="line"><!---->how to trigger?<!----></span><br>1) Visit chrome://inspect<span class="line"><!---->1) Visit chrome://inspect<!----></span><br>2) Open devtools (F12/Ctrl-Shift-i/etc.)<span class="line"><!---->2) Open devtools (F12/Ctrl-Shift-i/etc.)<!----></span><br>3) Click on 'other' in the left hand pane.<span class="line"><!---->3) Click on 'other' in the left hand pane.<!----></span><br>4) Click 'inspect' on one of the 'devtools://' targets - this opens a devtools window<span class="line"><!---->4) Click 'inspect' on one of the 'devtools://' targets - this opens a devtools window<!----></span><br>5) In the devtools window console, run `DevToolsHost.showContextMenuAtPoint(1.1, 2.2, [0x41414141]);`<span class="line"><!---->5) In the devtools window console, run `DevToolsHost.showContextMenuAtPoint(1.1, 2.2, [0x41414141]);`<!----></span><br><br>it will crash in debug version or TOT.<span class="line"><!---->it will crash in debug version or TOT.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        I think the severity is fairly low since this cannot be programatically exploited.         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
